model
Class ProvidesPort

java.lang.Object
  model.AbstractForroPort
      model.AbstractEnumPort
          model.ProvidesPort
All Implemented Interfaces:
Port, EnumPort, ForroPort
Direct Known Subclasses:
FemoopDiscrete.ElemSetProvidesPort, FemoopDiscrete.NodeSetProvidesPort, FemoopNumerical.ElemMatSetProvidesPort, FemoopNumerical.IndVecProvidesPort
public abstract class ProvidesPort
extends AbstractEnumPort
implements EnumPort

A skeletal implementation of the Port interface to minimize the effort required to implement provides ports. This includes a private inner class implementing a packed iterator and an implementation of the startIterator method. A class that extends this one must implement the toArray method of the Port interface, and the iterator abstract method of this class.

The iterator implemented by this object is backed by the iterator returned by the iterator() abstract method.

Every concrete implementation of this class must be public.

Author:
Ricardo Corrï¿½a (correa@lia.ufc.br)

Method Detail

isUses

public boolean isUses()
Description copied from interface: ForroPort
Return true if this object extends UsesPort, which means that it contains remotely callable methods. If it returns false, then this object extends ProvidesPort, and only local method invocations are allowed.

Specified by:
isUses in interface ForroPort
Returns:
true if this object is remote.

isProvides

public boolean isProvides()
Description copied from interface: ForroPort
Return true if this object extends ProvidesPort, which means that only local method invocations are allowed. If it returns false, then this object extends UsesPort, and it contains remotely callable methods.

Specified by:
isProvides in interface ForroPort
Returns:
true if this object is local.

iterator

protected abstract java.util.Iterator iterator()
Returns an iterator that gives the view of the model component associated with this port.

Returns:
the view iterator

startIterator

public Datatype startIterator()
Description copied from interface: EnumPort
The implementation of this method depends on the result of isUses. If it returns true, then the implementation should get the values according to the data transfer policy of the link associated with the binding of this port. Otherwise, the implementation should send the values according to the mentioned data transfer policy. This means that the next method returns arrays of elements.

Specified by:
startIterator in interface EnumPort
Returns:
an identifier for the iterator of the view of a model corresponding to this port.
